description:
Population Raster Guam 2020 Data Input: 
Settlement footprint from Facebook's High-Resolution Population Density Maps https://data.humdata.org/dataset/guam-high-resolution-population-density-maps-demographic-estimates Population allocated proportionally using 2011 census population counts at district level. Year Population Growth Rate of 1.64% has been applied to update population up to 2020
The human settlement footprint with census population allocated has been converted into a 100 m resolution raster.
name: Guam_Population_Grid_2020
